text: Sandral railway station () is located in Pakistan.The Sandral is a small village of District Khushab. unfortunately the Sandral Railway Station are not on his place after the Railway Stop.The train track are also destroy due to unseriousness of our Railway Department.The pitcher of Sandral Railway track are below Sandral railway Track station ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Pakistan
title: Sandral railway station
